title: How a Mosquito Operates
summary: How a Mosquito Operates is a 1912 silent animated film by American cartoonist Winsor McCay.  The six-minute short depicts a giant mosquito tormenting a sleeping man.  The film is one of the earliest works of animation, and its technical quality is considered far ahead of its time.  It is also known under the titles The Story of a Mosquito and Winsor McCay and his Jersey Skeeters.
